title: As a user I want to see IBP payments on a player's CSP Payment History
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * IBP Payment lines in player's Payment History match format that displays in ebis1 for IBP payments. * When a player earns an IBP award, the payment displays in the player's Payment History and the Remaining is appropriately adjusted.

title: As a user I want to be able to Save and Print from an Invoice
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=invoice

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When in edit mode, the user will see a "Save & Print" button, in addition to the regular Save and Print buttons. 
* Clicking "Save & Print" will allow the user to select which letter they want to print - just as if they had clicked "Print". 
* After they have chosen the options they want, clicking "Save & Print" will save any changes made to the invoice, display a blue successful save notification and generate a pdf of the selected letter in the chosen language.

title: As a user I no longer want "Cover Letter" to be an option on an Invoice
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When clicking "Print" or "Save and Print" from a CSP Invoice, "Cover Letter" is no longer an option.

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much tuition allowance money has been refunded to a player
custom_steps: Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Part of the CSP Calc that is run on each Save of an Invoice and/or Credit should be to verify that a player has not had too much money refunded to them for a particular period. * This check will only apply for Invoices/Credits for CSPs with a Signing Date on or after 10/3/2004* If the dollar amounts entered on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total tuition allowance amount for the Period the Invoice/Credit is being entered for to be greater than the available per period amount, then an error should be displayed.  See Messages #41

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much living allowance money has been refunded to a player
custom_steps: Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Part of the CSP Calc that is run on each Save of an Invoice and/or Credit should be to verify that a player has not had too much money refunded to them for a particular period. * This check will only apply for Invoices/Credits for CSPs with a Signing Date on or after 10/3/2004*  If the dollar amounts entered for living allowance on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total living allowance amount for the Period the Invoice/Credit is being entered for to be greater than the available per period amount, then an error should be displayed.  See Messages #42

title: As a user I want to see an error if too many credits have been refunded to a player
custom_steps: Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Part of the CSP Calc that is run on each Save of an Invoice and/or Credit should be to verify that a player has not had too many Credits refunded to them for a particular period. * This check will only apply for Invoices/Credits for CSPs with a Signing Date prior to 10/3/2004* If thecredits entered on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total credits for the Period the Invoice/Credit is being entered for to be greater than the available per period amount, then an error should be displayed. See Messages #14

title: As a user I want to see an error if too many tuition credits have been refunded to a player

See Messages #43

See Messages #15

title: As a user I want to see an error if too many living credits have been refunded to a player
custom_steps: Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Part of the CSP Calc that is run on each Save of an Invoice and/or Credit should be to verify that a player has not had too many credits refunded to them for a particular period. * This check will only apply for Invoices/Credits for CSPs with a Signing Date on or after 10/3/2004*  If the living credits entered on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total living allowance credits for the Period the Invoice/Credit is being entered for to be greater than the available per period amount, then an error should be displayed. title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to enter Living Expenses for a CSP  that is Current, Tuition Allowance Only
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * If Living Expenses are added to an Invoice for a CSP and the start date of the Period the invoice is being entered for is after the 10 Year Expiration Date for the player's CSP, then display an error. Messages #16*Note this will not apply to CSPs that do not have a Living Allowance Expiration Date*

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to enter Living Expenses for a CSP  that occurs after the 10 Year Expiration Date
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * If Living Expenses are added to an Invoice for a CSP and the start date of the Period the invoice is being entered for is after the 10 Year Expiration Date for the player's CSP, then display an error. Messages #16*Note this will not apply to CSPs that do not have a Living Allowance Expiration Date*

title: As a developer I want the CSP calc to account for earned IBPs
custom_steps: Add IBP adjustments to CSP calc

title: As a user I want to see an error if I enter a Total of 0 on a Credit
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Credit

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CSP Credit should ensure that the Total is >0. If it is not, then display an error. See Messages #11

title: As a user I want the CSP Calc to be kicked off whenever a Credit is Saved
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Calc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CSP Credit screen will prompt the CSP Calc to run. 
* The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CSP if necessary.

title: As a user I want the CSP Calc to be kicked off whenever an Invoice is Saved
custom_steps: Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcAcceptance Criteria: * Clicking "Save" on a CSP Invoice screen will prompt the CSP Calc to run. * The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CSP if necessary.

title: As a user I want the CSP Calc to be kicked off whenever the CSP Summary is Saved
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Calc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CSP Summary screen will prompt the CSP Calc to run. 
* The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CSP if necessary.

title: As a user I want to see a notification when a player's CSP changes status
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Calc

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a player's CSP status is updated as a result of the CSP Calc, the relevant blue successful notification is displayed. 
* If the CSP Status is updated to Completed, display Message #1.
* If the CSP Status is updated to Current, Living Allowance Only, display Message #2.
* If the CSP Status is updated to Current, Tuition Allowance Only, display Message #3.

title: As a user I want to attempting delete a CSP Invoice to run the CSP calc first
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Clicking "Delete" on a CSP Invoice will run the CSP calc prior to allowing the user to continue with the delete. * The following are the particular rules that could be violated by a CSP Invoice delete:   * As a user I want to see an error if too much living allowance money has been refunded to a player. #144748403  * As a user I want to see an error if too much tuition allowance money has been refunded to a player. #144748405  * As a user I want to see an error if too much money has been refunded to a player. #144496959  * As a user I want to see an error if too many living credits have been refunded to a player. #144748905  * As a user I want to see an error if too many tuition credits have been refunded to a player. #144748907  * As a user I want to see an error if too many credits have been refunded to a player. #144496905

title: As a user I want to attempting to delete a CSP Credit to run the CSP calc first
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Clicking "Delete" on a CSP Credit will run the CSP calc prior to allowing the user to continue with the delete. * In particular the system will check that the deletion of the Credit will not cause the player to exceed the maximum dollar amount allowed for the CSP. If the deletion of the Credit will result in the player exceeding the maximum dollar amount allowed by the CSP for the relevant term, then the delete will not be allowed.* The following are the particular rules that could be violated by a CSP Credit delete:   * You have reached or surpassed the maximum dollar amount allowed for this pay period - Tuition Allowance. #142023125  * You have reached or surpassed the maximum dollar amount allowed for this pay period - Living Allowance. #142023121  * You have reached or surpassed the maximum dollar amount allowed for this pay period. #142023127

title: As a BOC user I want to see the CSP Players widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaire

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user lands on the CSP/CEP dashboard, the "Current CSP/CEP" widget displays on a Players tab.
* There is an "Org" filter in the header. "All" should be an option, along with each of the 30 individual Orgs. By default this should be set to "ARI". 
* Org column should be available. 
* The widget should be populated with all of the players who have CSP with a status of Current, Current - Living Allowance Only or Current - Tuition Allowance Only. Completed and Lapsed players should not display. 
* The widget layout should match the provided data discovery. 
* Default sort should be on player's Last Name, secondary sort on player's First Name. 
* Player's Name should be a hyperlink to the player's profile - > CSP Tab. 
* Remaining, Used and Commitment columns will contain the relevant values from the player's CSP tabs. Players who have separate tuition and living allowances will display with "T - $0 / L -$0" per the wireframe. Players without the separation will display a single dollar amount in each column. 
* Estimated Lapsed Date logic/population will be delivered with another story. 
* 10 -Year Expiration should match that on the player's profile where applicable (not applicable to those who do not have a Living Allowance), this column should be blank for those players. 
* Questionnaire Sent column will be populated in a follow up story. 
* Default filter behavior and export should be delivered with this story.

title: As a Club user I want to see the CSP Players widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaire

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=94669235

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Club user lands on the CSP/CEP dashboard, the "Current CSP/CEP" widget displays. 
* There is no "Org" filter in the header. The widget should only be populated with players for whom the viewing Org is the Responsible Org and the user should not be able to view another Org's information.  
* Org column should not be available. 
* The widget should be populated with all of the players who have CSP with a status of Current, Current - Living Allowance Only or Current - Tuition Allowance Only. Completed and Lapsed players should not display. 
* The widget layout should match the provided data discovery. (aside from the exceptions noted already)
* Default sort should be on player's Last Name, secondary sort on player's First Name. 
* Player's Name should be a hyperlink to the player's profile - > CSP Tab. 
* Remaining, Used and Commitment columns will contain the relevant values from the player's CSP tabs. Players who have separate tuition and living allowances will display with "T - $0 / L -$0" per the wireframe. Players without the separation will display a single dollar amount in each column. 
* Estimated Lapsed Date logic/population will be delivered with another story. 
* 10 -Year Expiration should match that on the player's profile where applicable (not applicable to those who do not have a Living Allowance), this column should be blank for those players. 
* Questionnaire Sent column will be populated in a follow up story. 
* Default filter behavior and export should be delivered with this story.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to Print Multiple Questionnaires
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaire

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the Current CSP/CEP widget, if the user has CSP Edit permissions, they see a "Print Questionnaires" button on the widget. 
* Clicking "Print Questionnaires" will launch a popover for the user to enter a Club Contact.
* Clicking "Print" from the popover will find all of the players on the selected Org that do not yet have a date populated for "Questionnaire Sent" and generate a single pdf containing the Questionnaires for all of the players. 
* The Questionnaires printed for each player should match what would print for the player if the user selected "Print Questionnaire" from the player's profile and selected "Player" and their primary address. 

*As part of this story we need to translate the boolean from ebis1 to a date in ebis2. If the player is marked as sent in ebis1 then we should populate a date, and those not yet marked sent should remain blank*

title: As a Club user I want to Clear the Queue of Printed Questionnaires
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaire

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the Current CSP/CEP widget, if a user has CSP Edit permissions, they see a "Clear Queue" button on the widget. 
* Clicking "Clear Queue" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to clear the queue. See Messages #39
* If the user confirms, then any players who do not yet have a "Questionnaire Sent" date populated for their Org will have the current date populated for them.

title: As a Club user I want to see the last time the Queue was cleared
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaire

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Hovering over the "Clear Queue" button should display a tooltip that states the last time that the Queue was cleared for the viewing Org.

title: As a user I want the Print Questionnaires and Clear Queue button disabled if there are no players in the queue
custom_steps: Wireframe:http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_players_and_questionnaireAC:- If no players are in the queue(Questionnaire Sent is populated for all visible rows) the buttons Print Questionnaires and Clear Queue are disabled- The buttons should disable themselves after a user successfully clears the queue and the widget refreshes.

title: As a user I want to see IBP payments on a player's CEP Payment History
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * IBP Payment lines in player's Payment History match format that displays in ebis1 for IBP payments. * When a player earns an IBP award, the payment displays in the player's Payment History and the Remaining is appropriately adjusted.

title: As a user, I want all existing CEPs created in production to be loaded into the CEP table
custom_steps:
Since the CEP contract clause is now available in production, we will need a SQL update to load the existing entries into the new CEP table.

This should run as part of the CSP conversion.

title: As a user I want the Lapse batch to update a player's Estimated Lapse Date
custom_steps: Batch Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91885937Acceptance Criteria: * Running the batch will find all of the CEP's that are Current, Current - Living Allowance Only and Current - Tuition Allowance Only. * The system will estimate the potential lapse date for each CEP that falls in one of those statuses. * The batch will find the last date the player had a valid roster status OR the latest Paid Date or Check Date for the player, whichever is later, and add 2 years. * The Potential Lapse Date will display for each player in the Current CSP/CEP widget. Ultimately this information will also be part of the communication to the Player portal via mlb.com. * Valid roster statuses:MJ: DFA, 15D, 15R, 10D, 10R, 7DC, 7CR, 60D, 60R, BRV, PTR, MIL, ACT, PND, SUS, OPTMn: ACT, 60D, 60R, 7DL, 7RH, TI

title: As a user I want to save a new Invoice for a player with a CEP clause
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=cep
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=invoice_1

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CEP+Invoice

Acceptance Criteria:
* When creating a new Invoice for a player with a CEP clause, there should be a Save and a Cancel button. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel any changes made. 
     * If this invoice has not yet been saved, confirming this will discard the new invoice, and return the user to the player's CEP tab. 
     * If the invoice has previously been saved, then confirming will discard any changes and refresh the screen in view mode.  
     * If the user does not confirm, the modal is dismissed and the user is returned to the invoice in edit mode with their edits maintained. 
* Clicking "Save" will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. 
* Once the required field and format check has passed, the system will reload the form in view mode and display a blue successful save notification.

*Note that Start/End Date will be editable for all School types with this story - followup story will adjust for 2/4year as it is detailed in the data discovery*

title: As a user I want the Start and End Date on CEP Invoices to default to the system values entered if applicable
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CEP+Invoice

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Selecting a School Type of "2 Year/ 4 Year" will disable the "Start Date" and "End Date" fields and will populate the fields with the dates entered for the Year/Period selected. 
* If School Type is set to "Vocational/Online" then the Start Date and End Date fields should remain enabled. 
* BOC should still be able to edit these fields, but Clubs cannot.

title: As a user I want to save a new Credit for a player with a CEP clause
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=cep
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=credit_1

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CEP+Credit

Acceptance Criteria:
* When creating a new Credit for a player with a CEP clause, there should be a Save and a Cancel button. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel any changes made. 
     * If this credit has not yet been saved, confirming this will discard the new credit, and return the user to the player's CEP tab. 
     * If the credit has previously been saved, then confirming will discard any changes and refresh the screen in view mode.  
     * If the user does not confirm, the modal is dismissed and the user is returned to the credit in edit mode with their edits maintained. 
* Clicking "Save" will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. 
* Once the required field and format check has passed, the system will reload the form in view mode and display a blue successful save notification.

title: As a user I want the Start and End Date on CEP Credits to default to the system values entered if applicable
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CEP+Credit

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On a CEP credit, selecting a School Type of "2 Year/ 4 Year" will disable the "Start Date" and "End Date" fields and will populate the fields with the dates entered for the Year/Period selected. 
* If School Type is set to "Vocational/Online" then the Start Date and End Date fields should remain enabled and the "Period" field should not display. 
* BOC should still be able to edit these fields, but Clubs cannot.

title: As a user I want to see an error when I attempt to enter an Invoice containing Living Expenses for a term before the term has ended
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Invoice

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CEP Invoice will check to see if Living Expenses >0. If yes and if either End Date is blank OR the current date is not after the end date in the invoice, then display an error. Messages #17

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much tuition allowance money has been refunded to a player (CEP)
custom_steps: Messages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * On each Save of a CEP Credit, the system should  verify that a player has not had too much money refunded to them. *  If the dollar amounts entered on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total tuition allowance amount to be greater than the committed amount, then an error should be displayed.  See Messages #45

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much living allowance money has been refunded to a player (CEP)
custom_steps: Messages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * On each Save of a CEP Credit, the system should  verify that a player has not had too much money refunded to them. * If the dollar amounts entered on an Invoice or a Credit will cause the total living allowance amount to be greater than the committed amount, then an error should be displayed. See Messages #46

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to enter Living Expenses for a CEP  that occurs after the 10 Year Expiration Date
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * If Living Expenses are added to an Invoice for a CEP and the start date of the invoice is after the 10 Year Expiration Date for the player's CEP, then display an error. Messages #16

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to enter Living Expenses for a CEP  that is Current, Tuition Allowance Only
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * If Living Expenses are added to an Invoice for a CEP and the start date of the invoice is after the 10 Year Expiration Date for the player's CEP, then display an error. Messages #16

title: As a user I want to see an error if I enter a Net Amount that is > Total Amount (CEP)
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * When clicking Save on a CEP Invoice, if the Net Amount entered is greater than the Total Amount, display an error. Messages #13* {0} should be replaced with the Start Date of the Invoice, and 1 should be replaced with the Total Amount from that invoice.

title: As a user I want to see an error when I enter a Total Amount that is not >0
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Invoice

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When clicking Save on a CEP Invoice, if the Total Amount is not greater than 0, display an error. Messages #11

title: As a user I want to see an error when I enter a Net Amount equal to 0 (CEP)
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Invoice

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When clicking Save on a CEP Invoice, if the Net Amount field is present and the Invoice Status = Paid, and the Net Amount equals 0, display an error. Messages #12

title: As a user I want to receive an error if enter an End Date after the Start Date
custom_steps: *Error Messages:*https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria:* When creating a new invoice for a player with a current CEP, if the user enters a start date after the end date, when the user saves, they will see an error that reads: "You cannot enter a start date after the end date."

title: As a user I want to see an error if I enter a Net Amount that is > Total Amount (CEP) for an Invoice in a Player's Payment History
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+InvoiceMessages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * When clicking Save on a CEP Summary screen, if the Net Amount entered is greater than the Total Amount for any invoice present in the history, display an error. Messages #13* {0} should be replaced with the Start Date of the Invoice, and 1 should be replaced with the Total Amount from that invoice.

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much tuition allowance money has been entered on an invoice (CEP)
custom_steps:
Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On each Save of a CEP Invoice, the system should verify that the player's remaining available tuition allowance balance will not be <0. 
* If the dollar amounts entered on the Invoice, in conjunction with all prior invoices and credits,  will cause the tuition allowance balance to be <0, then an error should be displayed. See Messages #47

title: As a user I want to see an error if too much living allowance money has been entered for a player (CEP)
custom_steps:
Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On each Save of a CEP Invoice, the system should verify that the player's remaining available living allowance balance will not be <0. 
* If the dollar amounts entered on the Invoice, in conjunction with all prior invoices and credits,  will cause the living allowance balance to be <0, then an error should be displayed. See Messages #48

title: As a user I want to see an error if I enter a Total of 0 on a Credit
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+Credit

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CEP Credit should ensure that the Total is >0. If it is not, then display an error. See Messages #11

title: As a user I want the CEP calc to run whenever an Invoice is saved
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Calc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on an Invoice will prompt the CEP Calc to run. 
* The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CEP if necessary.

title: As a user I want the CEP calc to run whenever a Credit is saved
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Calc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a Credit will prompt the CEP Calc to run. 
* The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CEP if necessary.

title: As a user I want the CEP calc to run whenever a CEP Summary is saved
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Calc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Save" on a CEP Summary screen will prompt the CEP Calc to run. 
* The running of this calc will update the "Used" and "Remaining" values on the summary screen, as well as change the status of the CEP if necessary.

title: As a user I want to see a notification when a player's CEP changes status
custom_steps:
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Calc

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a player's CEP status is updated as a result of the CEP Calc, the relevant blue successful notification is displayed. 
* If the CEP Status is updated to Completed, display Message #1.
* If the CEP Status is updated to Current, Living Allowance Only, display Message #2.
* If the CEP Status is updated to Current, Tuition Allowance Only, display Message #3.

title: As a user I want to attempting to delete a CEP Credit to run the CEP calc first
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Clicking "Delete" on a CEP Credit will run the CEP calc prior to allowing the user to continue with the delete. * In particular the system will check that the deletion of the Credit will not cause the player to exceed the maximum dollar amount allowed for the CEP. If the deletion of the Credit will result in the player exceeding the maximum dollar amount allowed by the CEP, then the delete will not be allowed.* The following are the particular rules that could be violated by a CSP Credit delete:   * You have reached or surpassed the maximum dollar amount allowed for Tuition Allowance. #145003175  * You have reached or surpassed the maximum dollar amount allowed for Living Allowance. #145003171

title: As a user I want to attempting to delete a CEP Invoice to run the CEP calc first
custom_steps: Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+CalcMessages:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+MessagesAcceptance Criteria: * Clicking "Delete" on a CSP Invoice will run the CSP calc prior to allowing the user to continue with the delete. * The following are the particular rules that could be violated by a CSP Credit delete:   * As a user I want to see an error if too much living allowance money has been refunded to a player. #144748883  * As a user I want to see an error if too much tuition allowance money has been refunded to a player. #144496931

title: As a user I want to be able to print a CEP Invoice
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * When viewing a CEP Invoice that has been saved at least once, in view or edit mode, there is a "Print" button. * Clicking this button will launch a pop up where the user will have the ability to select the Invoice option to print. * The user will also have the ability to choose whether to print in Spanish or English. The default will always be English. * The user will also have a space to enter in a Club Contact to print on the Invoice. * When the user clicks "Print" with "Invoice" selected, the system will download a pdf of the invoice in the language selected according to the provided specifications to the user's computer.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a CEP Acknowledgment letter from a CEP Invoice
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * When viewing a CEP Invoice that has been saved at least once, in view or edit mode, there is a "Print" button. * Clicking this button will launch a pop up where the user will have the ability to select the Acknowledgment option to print. * The user will also have the ability to choose whether to print in Spanish or English. The default will always be English. * The user will also have a space to enter in a Club Contact to print on the letter. * When the user clicks "Print" with "Acknowledgment" selected, the system will download a pdf of the Reimbursement Acknowledgment letter in the language selected according to the provided specifications to the user's computer.

title: CEP Questionnaire - Reporting Team
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Welcome+Kit+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CEP+Welcome+Kit+-+Report+Details

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The above documentation, will be used to create an CEP Acknowledgment Letter.
* Note that there are 2 versions of the welcome kit, each available in both English and Spanish. 1 version is for players with both Living Allowance and Tuition Allowance, and the other is for players with only Tuition Allowance. 
* The LDAP ebis-rpt-app-reporting should be used for security for this letter.

title: As a user I want to edit a CEP tab on a player profile for a player with CEP
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=cep

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CEP+Summary

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The CEP Summary tab has an Edit button in view mode if the user has CSP edit permissions. 
* Clicking edit puts the Summary tab into edit mode, according to the Data Discovery. 
* A Save button and a cancel button are available in Edit mode.
* Clicking "Save" will conduct a required field and formatting check according to the data discovery. 
* Once the required field check has passed, the changes will be saved and a blue successful save notification will be displayed. The page will reload in View mode. 
* Any changes that were made to the Payment History are reflected in the associated Invoice.
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they are sure that they wish to lose any changes. If they confirm, the form is put back in view mode and no changes are saved. If they do not confirm, the modal is closed and they are returned to the form in edit mode with their changes still present.

title: As a user I don't want to be able to enter a Lapsed Date if the status doesn't allow for it
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user edits the CEP Summary and enters a Lapsed Date when the status is not set to "Lapsed", clicking "Save" on the CEP Summary will trigger an error. See Messages #5
* This error will also be triggered on "Save" from an Invoice or a Credit.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if I do not enter a Net Amount >0 for a Paid Invoice in a Player's Payment History
custom_steps:
Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When clicking Save on a player's CEP Summary, if an Invoice Status = Paid, and the Net Amount equals 0, display an error. Messages #12

title: As a user I don't want to be able to enter a Tuition Allowance Completed Date if the status doesn't allow for it
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user edits the CEP Summary and enters a Tuition Allowance Completed Date when the status is not set to "Current, Living Allowance Only" or "Completed" or "Lapsed", clicking "Save" on the CEP Summary will trigger an error. See Messages #7
* This error will also be triggered on "Save" from an Invoice or a Credit.

title: As a user I don't want to be able to enter a Living Allowance Completed Date if the status doesn't allow for it
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/CSP+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user edits the CSP Summary and enters a Living Allowance Completed Date when the status is not set to "Current, Tuition Allowance Only" or "Completed" or "Lapsed", clicking "Save" on the CSP Summary will trigger an error. See Messages #8.
* This error will also be triggered on "Save" from an Invoice or a Credit.

title: As a user I want to see a player's Eligible Recall Date on their pro player profile
custom_steps: Wireframe:http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=waivers___transactionsAcceptance Criteria: * When viewing a pro player profile, under the "Options" section of the Waivers & Trans tab there is an "Eligible Recall Date" field. * This field is blank if the player does not currently have a MJ Roster Status of Optioned.* Otherwise this field should display the player's current Eligible Recall Date (can be found on MJ Roster widget and PIS report).

title: As a user I want to be able to see a "Schools" tab on the CSP/CEP Dashboard
custom_steps: Wireframe:http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_cep_schoolsData Discovery:https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=107118753Acceptance Criteria: * If a user has CSP view or edit permissions they see the "Schools" tab on the CSP/CEP Dashboard.* Clicking on the "Schools" tab will load the widget per the wireframe and the data discovery. * The browser tab text will say CSP/CEP Schools* The widget will be populated with all of the non-deleted CSP School profiles in the system. * The default sort will be on School Name. * Default column sort, filtering and exporting should work. * A submenu will be added to the main navigation with links in alphabetical order* Update the browser tab text to say CSP/CEP Players when the Players tab is active

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new CSP/CEP School Profile
custom_steps: Wireframe:http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_cep_schoolsData Discovery:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+SchoolAcceptance Criteria: * On the Schools widget there should be a "New School" Action Button for users with CSP edit permissions.* Clicking this should launch a new, blank school profile. * Form should match the provided wireframe and data discovery. * There should be a "Save" and  "Cancel" button in grey. * Clicking "Cancel" will ask the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes, and if the user confirms it will discard the profile entirely and return the user to the point of entry. * Clicking "Save" will run a required field and formatting check according to the data discovery. If that passes, the system will save the profile, display a blue success notification, and reload the form in view mode. * After the profile has been saved, it should be available for selection in Invoices and Player Letters.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to delete a CSP/CEP School Profile
custom_steps: Wireframe:http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=new_csp-cep_schoolData Discovery:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+SchoolAcceptance Criteria: * When a BOC user with CSP edit permissions is viewing a school profile, they should see a "Delete" button. * Clicking this should ask the user to confirm that they wish to permanently delete the school profile. * If the user confirms, the system will delete the school's profile. * A blue successful notification will display. * Invoices that have been saved with this school's information prepopulated should not be impacted.

title: As a developer, we need an unauthorized rule check when one club attempts to edit another clubs professional player profile
custom_steps:
Professional player profiles should throw an error when the user is not allowed to edit the player in question.

There is currently no rule check in place when saving a player profile to ensure that the user is allowed to make the edit.  We only check that they have the correct roles and not whether the player can be modified.  The check should be expanded to include the following:

BOC users can update all players
Club users can update only players on their own team or free agent/released players who are not associated with another team.

title: As a club user I don't want to be able to open another Club's invoice
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * When viewing a player's CSP or CEP Summary tab, the Invoices are not hyperlinks if the viewing user's Org is not BOC or the Responsible Org. * This applies to both CSP and CEP invoices.

title: As a club user I don't want to be able to open another Club's credit
custom_steps: Acceptance Criteria: * When viewing a player's CSP or CEP Summary tab, the Credits are not hyperlinks if the viewing user's Org is not BOC or the Responsible Org. * This applies to both CSP and CEP credits.

title: As a user I want to see Start and End Dates on the System Dates screen for CSP Periods
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=system_dates

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "System Dates" screen is updated to contain the dates per the wireframe. 
* The dates are able to be entered /edited/deleted in the same manner as the rest of the system dates screen. 
* The remainder of the system dates screen is unaffected.

title: Update CSP Lapse Batch to include CEP
custom_steps:
Lapse Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91885929

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The CSP Lapse Batch should be renamed the "CSP/CEP Lapse Batch" 
* The Lapse Batch logic will need to be updated to pull in the new CEP clauses.
* The logic with regard to when a CEP will be lapsed should match that of the CSP clauses.

title: As a user I want the CSP lapse batch to update a player's Estimated Lapse Date
custom_steps:
Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91885937

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Running the batch will find all of the CSP's that are Current, Current - Living Allowance Only and Current - Tuition Allowance Only. 
* The system will estimate the potential lapse date for each CSP that falls in one of those statuses. 
* The batch will find the last date the player had a valid roster status OR the latest Paid Date or Check Date for the player, whichever is later, and add 2 years. 
* The Potential Lapse Date will display for each player in the Current CSP/CEP widget. Ultimately this information will also be part of the communication to the Player portal via mlb.com. 
* Valid roster statuses:
MJ: DFA, 15D, 15R, 10D, 10R, 7DC, 7CR, 60D, 60R, BRV, PTR, MIL, ACT, PND, SUS, OPT
Mn: ACT, 60D, 60R, 7DL, 7RH, TI

title: As a user I want to run the CSP Update batch
custom_steps:
Wires (generic): 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=contrat_expiration
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=global_results_widget

Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91885937

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "CSP Update" appears as a batch option under the "Minor Contracts/CSP" section on the batch screen.
* Clicking "CSP Update" opens the batch in the batch screen. 
* The batch parameters display per the batch requirements. 
* A "Run" button is available. 
* Clicking "Run" will run the batch according to the selected parameters. 
* Running the batch will find all of the CSP's that should be updated, and update the CSP information accordingly (see rules). 
* Any player who had their CSP information updated as a result of this batch running should display in the "Batch Results" widget. Available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Responsible Org, Current Org, Old Estimated Available Balance, New Estimated Available Balance, Old Balance, New Balance. 
* Batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a user I want running CSP Advanced Searches to also return CEP results
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Running an advanced search for "CSP/CEP Summary" will return results for both CSPs and CEPs. 
* The "CSP Status" column in the results set for this search should be updated to be "Status", as should the filter of the same name. 
* Running an advanced search for "CSP/CEP Invoice" will return results for both CSP and CEP Invoices. 
* The "Scholarship Plan Status" filter for Invoices should be updated to be "CSP/CEP Status".
